recipe.title: Citrus Marinated Shrimp Cocktail
ingredients: 1 small red onion, thinly sliced (about 1 3/4 cups)
instructions: Combine juices, ketchup, vodka and hot pepper sauce in large bowl. Whisk in oil. Add shrimp, onion and cilantro and mix well. Cover and refrigerate at least 3 hours and up to 6 hours. Drain before serving.
